data: {"generalSituation":"Under the influence of an intense northeast monsoon, the weather will remain slightly cooler over Guangdong this morning. With the monsoon moderating gradually in the next couple of days, the weather will improve over southern China. It will be dry with temperatures rising during the day. An easterly airstream will affect Guangdong early to midweek next week. It will be cloudier over the region. Tropical Cyclone Fengshen will move towards the central part of Vietnam and dissipate gradually today. Besides, the area of low pressure now near the Luzon Strait is bringing unsettled weather to the region.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251023","week":"Thursday","forecastWind":"North force 4 to 5, force 6 offshore.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy. One or two light rain patches at first.
